claimModalFinePrint: Please note: claiming gems turns on analytics so we can improve Universe
claimModalText: Earn gems by mining and referring friends. The more gems you earn, the larger your Tari airdrop. Have a referral code? Enter it below and double your bonus from {{gems1}} gems to {{gems2}} gems!
claimModalTitle: EARN REWARDS FOR MINING ON TESTNET
claimReferralCode: Claim your referral code {{gems}} gems.
claimReferralGifts: Claim your referral code and earn {{gems}} gems. Once you connect your account, you’ll be awarded your gems.
giftReferralCode: Earn {{gems}} gems for each friend you invite to Tari Universe. Once they connect their account, you’ll be awarded your gems.
giftReferralCodeHeader: Claim your referral code {{gems}} gems.
keep-mining-to-earn-rewards: Keep mining to earn more rewards!

permission.setup: Tari Universe would like to use analytics to improve your experience.
permission.text: Tari Universe would like to use analytics to improve your experience and reward you with gems for mining.
permission.title: Earn Gems & make Tari Universe better

permissionNoGems.text: Tari Universe would like to use analytics to improve your experience.

topTooltipText: Get a Tari Airdrop by collecting gems. The more gems you earn, the larger your airdrop.
your-friend-accepted-gift: One of your friends accepted your gift!
